news_summary: A courageous 13-year-old boy heroically swam for hours to rescue his family after they were swept out to sea, showcasing remarkable bravery and love.
news_summary_fr: Un courageux garçon de 13 ans a nagé héroïquement pendant des heures pour sauver sa famille après qu'elle ait été emportée par la mer, faisant preuve d'un courage et d'un amour remarquables.
news_summary_es: Un valiente niño de 13 años nadó heroicamente durante horas para rescatar a su familia después de que fueran arrastrados al mar, demostrando una valentía y un amor extraordinarios.

articles.title: 'I was thinking about mum': Boy, 13, swims for hours to save family swept out to sea
articles.summary: Austin Applebee recounts his 'superhuman' swim which saved the lives of his mother and siblings in Australia.
articles.content: He had lost sight of his family, who had also lost sight of him. As Joanne and the children drifted further out to sea, the waves got bigger and bigger, making it harder to stay on the boards, while visibility had also got worse. They were all wearing life jackets - but they had no food or water.
articles.reasoning: The story reports a heroic and inspiring real-life event where a 13-year-old boy's extraordinary swim saved his family from drowning, demonstrating courage and resilience with a meaningful positive impact on his family and potentially inspiring others.
articles.personality_title: 13-year-old boy swims for hours to save family lost at sea
articles.personality_presentation:
**Context** – A family visiting the Australian coast got caught in strong waves and were swept out to sea. They were wearing life jackets but had no food or water, and the sea conditions made it hard for them to stay safe on their boards.

**What happened** – Austin Applebee, a 13-year-old boy, became separated from his mother and siblings as they drifted further away in the ocean. Despite the dangerous conditions and losing sight of each other, Austin swam for hours, thinking about his mother, to reach help and save his family.

**Impact** – Austin's swim was remarkable because of his young age and the long time he stayed in the water. His courage and strength helped rescue his family from a dangerous situation, showing how quick thinking and determination can make a big difference in emergencies.

**What's next step** – Authorities and community members are likely to share Austin's story to raise awareness about water safety. The family may also receive support to recover from this experience and help others learn how to stay safe at the beach.

**One-sentence takeaway** – A 13-year-old boy’s brave swim saved his family from drowning after they were swept out to sea in Australia.
articles.personality_title_fr: Un garçon de 13 ans nage pendant des heures pour sauver sa famille emportée en mer
articles.personality_presentation_fr:
**Contexte** – Une famille en visite sur la côte australienne a été emportée par de fortes vagues. Ils portaient des gilets de sauvetage mais n’avaient ni nourriture ni eau, et la mer agitée rendait leur situation dangereuse.

**Ce qui s'est passé** – Austin Applebee, un garçon de 13 ans, s’est séparé de sa mère et de ses frères et sœurs alors qu’ils dérivaient au large. Malgré les conditions difficiles et le fait qu'ils ne se voyaient plus, Austin a nagé pendant des heures, pensant à sa mère, pour aller chercher de l’aide et sauver sa famille.

**Impact** – La nage d’Austin est remarquable à cause de son jeune âge et de la longue durée passée dans l’eau. Son courage et sa force ont permis de sauver sa famille d’une situation dangereuse, montrant que la détermination peut changer le cours d’une urgence.

**Prochaine étape** – Les autorités et la communauté vont probablement partager l’histoire d’Austin pour sensibiliser à la sécurité en mer. La famille pourrait aussi recevoir un soutien pour se remettre de cette expérience et aider d’autres à rester en sécurité à la plage.

**Une phrase à retenir** – La nage courageuse d’un garçon de 13 ans a sauvé sa famille de la noyade après qu’ils ont été emportés en mer en Australie.
articles.personality_title_es: Niño de 13 años nada durante horas para salvar a su familia arrastrada al mar
articles.personality_presentation_es:
**Contexto** – Una familia que visitaba la costa australiana fue arrastrada por fuertes olas. Usaban chalecos salvavidas pero no tenían comida ni agua, y el mar agitado hacía difícil mantenerse seguros.

**Qué pasó** – Austin Applebee, un niño de 13 años, se separó de su madre y hermanos mientras eran arrastrados mar adentro. A pesar de las condiciones peligrosas y de no verse entre ellos, Austin nadó durante horas, pensando en su madre, para buscar ayuda y salvar a su familia.

**Impacto** – La hazaña de Austin es notable por su corta edad y el tiempo que pasó en el agua. Su valentía y fuerza ayudaron a rescatar a su familia de una situación peligrosa, demostrando que la determinación puede marcar una gran diferencia en emergencias.

**Próximo paso** – Las autoridades y la comunidad probablemente compartirán la historia de Austin para crear conciencia sobre la seguridad en el agua. La familia también podría recibir apoyo para recuperarse y ayudar a otros a estar seguros en la playa.

**Una frase para recordar** – La valiente natación de un niño de 13 años salvó a su familia de ahogarse después de ser arrastrados al mar en Australia.
articles.image_prompt: A gentle, warm-toned painting of a small, sturdy life jacket floating steadily on calm yet vast ocean waves under a soft sky, with a glowing silhouette of a determined young swimmer’s shadow beneath the water symbolizing courage and hope, while distant silhouettes of surfboards drift gently, representing family unity amid the sea.
